# Screenshots

This directory contains screenshots and images for the plugin documentation.

## Required Images

### jumpy-demo.png
Screenshot showing the Jumpy plugin in action with:
- Yellow label overlays on code
- Two-letter combinations visible (aa, ab, ac, etc.)
- Example showing labels at word boundaries

**Recommended specs:**
- Format: PNG
- Size: ~800-1200px wide
- Shows labels clearly visible on code
- Dark or light theme (your preference)

## Adding the Screenshot

Save your screenshot as `jumpy-demo.png` in this directory.
